function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and air filtration, ensuring regular air exchange, and following indoor air quality guidelines.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing occupancy limits, spatial reconfiguration, and scheduling to reduce crowd density, along with promoting personal hygiene and sanitation measures.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing regular and thorough cleaning protocols, using antimicrobial surfaces, and promoting hand hygiene practices among occupants.","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing building management strategies to balance thermal supply and demand","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and ventilation measures to reduce the spread of airborne contaminants. ensure regular cleaning and disinfection of monitoring equipment.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced filtration systems, strict maintenance of hvac systems, and air quality monitoring.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Window treatments for solar control, improvement of insulation, and optimization of hvac systems.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Improving ventilation systems, increasing air exchange rates, and implementing air purification technology","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing air purification technology, regular maintenance of air filters, and improving air filtration systems","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting thorough data analysis, cross-referencing subjective and objective data, and ensuring consistent monitoring and measurement standards","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct studies of building occupants’ satisfaction and demands on ieq parameters under natural
